episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

1.plot: While "borrowing" Rodolfo's super-charged Bronze Boots of Truth for a late-night spree of fun and destruction, Manny and Frida end up wrecking the prized objects of power.

3.title: Adios, Amigos/Zebra Donkey

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

3.plot: Manny wins the honour of taking care of his school's mascot, Zebra Donkey, over spring break./White Pantera's old sidekick-turned-bad, the Titanium Titan, returns to Miracle City to take his revenge on Manny.

6.title: The Late Manny Rivera/Party Monsters

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

6.plot: Manny and Frida, after an unprecedented string of "tardies," are given an ultimatum by the nasty Vice Principal Chakal: get to school on time or be expelled!

7.title: The Mustache Kid/Puma Lucito

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

7.plot: Longing to enjoy the perks of adult life, Manny decides that he will grow a moustache... no matter what it takes! After a few disastrous attempts, Manny rather foolishly allows the evil Dr. Chipotle, Jr. to use his moustache-growing machine on him

8.title: Miracle City Worker/Dia de los Malos

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

8.plot: After Manny is banned from Miracle City's Annual "Celebration of Heroes" for failing the "hero-meter" test at the door, Sartana of the Dead holds all the other heroes hostage.

9.title: Yellow Pantera/Rising Son

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

9.plot: After hearing a rumor that White Pantera once ran away from a fight with legendary El Mal Verde, Manny confronts his father and learns... it's true!

10.title: La Tigressa/Curse of the Albino Burrito

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

10.plot: Manny and Frida, misbehaving as usual, have been given disgusting after-school chores as punishment. They resign themselves to hours of drudgery, that is, until they run into Davi Rococo, a.k.a. the Albino Burrito.

11.title: Clash of the Titan/Eye Caramba

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

11.plot: The Titanium Titan, White Pantera's ex-sidekick turned supervillain, returns to Miracle City, claiming to have renounced his evil ways. He offers to serve White Pantera and El Tigre as their sidekick.

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

14.plot: The Titanium Titan, White Pantera's ex-sidekick turned supervillain, returns to Miracle City, claiming to have renounced his evil ways. He offers to serve White Pantera and El Tigre as their sidekick.

15.title: Burrito's Little Helper/Crouching Tigre, Hidden Dragon

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

15.plot: The ever-enthusiastic, ever-clueless "superhero" known as the Albino Burrito returns, and somehow El Tigre accidentally ends up agreeing to be his sidekick for a week.

16.title: The Cactus Kid/A Mother's Glove

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

16.plot: he Cactus Kid is a small town supervillain who's come to Miracle City to break into big time villainy. Unfortunately, his uncanny superpower is the ability to make cactuses bend slightly.

17.title: Wrong and Dance/Love and War

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

17.plot: Manny really wants to go to his first school dance with someone cool, someone hip, someone who will cement his reputation as one macho dude. So, he sets his sights on the bad girls. The really bad girls.

18.title: The Good, the Bad, and El Tigre Part 1/The Good, the Bad, and El Tigre, Part 2

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

18.plot: Sartana makes a stunning announcement to the entire supervillain community: She is retiring. Before she steps down, Sartana is holding a huge tournament to decide who will take over her massive evil empire and wield her powerful mystic guitar.

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

20.plot: Rodolfo is very disappointed in Manny, and Manny really wants to figure out a way to get back on his dad's good side. So he comes up with a brilliant plan.

21.title: Stinking Badges/Mech Daddy

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

21.plot: Longing to have more in common with her police chief father, Frida decides to join the Junior Police Cadets. Frida's sisters, who are in charge of the troop, are less than thrilled to see her among the recruits.

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

23.plot: When El Oso saves Tigre and Frida's lives, they owe him a favor. So, Oso asks them to help him win the heart of the beautiful Bear Princess. The weird thing is, this princess is a real bear, not a bear-person like Oso.

episode of.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera (TV Series 2007–2008)

25.plot: Both Manny and Dr. Chipotle Jr. have forgotten to get Fathers Day presents for their dads, so they team up to solve the problem. They stage a fake fight in which Rodolfo is "captured" and Manny must "save him" from the evil Chipotles.

imdb.plot outline: Thirteen-year-old Mexican superhero Manny Rivera has powers as the masked warrior El Tigre and some bizarre enemies. Manny is from a family of superpowered ancestors, his own superhero father and villain grandfather. His best friend Frida is very protective, but she can also get him into trouble. He wants to be good, but being bad is a much more exciting adventure!
imdb.title: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera
plot: The daily adventures of a 12 year old Mexican superhero dealing with bizarre enemies, as well as his own superhero father and villain grandfather.::tb4000

Thirteen-year-old Mexican superhero Manny Rivera has powers as the masked warrior El Tigre and some bizarre enemies. Manny is from a family of superpowered ancestors, his own superhero father and villain grandfather. His best friend Frida is very protective, but she can also get him into trouble. He wants to be good, but being bad is a much more exciting adventure!::Jwelch5742
